activities:
Client Intellect is a dynamic US based corporation managing multiple technology brands.
Client Intellect collects the following personal data such as internet protocol address, the kind of browser or computer you use, State or country from which you accessed the Client Intellect website, date and time of the website visit, prospective customer information, service sign up information and customer contact information which may include the following; name, address, organization (if applicable), email address, payment information (credit card, e-check, cvv, check information), telephone, fax and mobile number.
This personal data is collected through a variety of sources; Client Intellects website, telephone calls, live chat, web forms, internal ticketing system and written correspondences. This information is used to provide services to customers.
eucountries: Belgium, Cyprus, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Lithuania, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (EU DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
